大端指令序列
34080001    0011_0100_0000_1000_0000_0000_0000_0001  ori   $t0, $zero, 0x1   # t0 = 1
34090001    0011_0100_0000_1001_0000_0000_0000_0001  ori   $t1, $zero, 0x1   # t1 = 1
34110004    0011 0100 0001 0001 0000 0000 0000 0100    ori   $s1, $zero, 0x4   # s1 = 4
340c0100    0011 0100 0000 1100 0000 0001 0000 0000    ori   $t4, $zero, 0x100 # t4 = 0x100
3c048040    001111_00000001001000000001000000    lui   $a0, 0x8040       # a0 = 0x80400000
008c6821    000000_00100011000110100000100001    addu  $t5, $a0, $t4     # t5 = 0x80400100
loop:
01095021    000000_01000010010101000000100001       addu  $t2, $t0, $t1     # t2 = t0+t1
35280000    001101_01001010000000000000000000       ori   $t0, $t1, 0x0     # t0 = t1
35490000    001101_01010010010000000000000000       ori   $t1, $t2, 0x0     # t1 = t2
ac890000    101011_00100_01001_0000000000000000     sw    $t1, 0($a0)
8c8b0000    100011_00100_01011_0000000000000000       lw    $t3, 0($a0)
152b0004    000101_01001010110000000000000100       bne   $t1, $t3, end
34000000    001101_00000000000000000000000000       ori   $zero, $zero, 0   # noop
00912021    000000_00100100010010000000100001       addu  $a0, $a0, $s1     # a0 += 4
148dfff7    000101_00100_01101_1111111111110111       bne   $a0, $t5, loop
34000000    001101_00000000000000000000000000       ori   $zero, $zero, 0   # noop
end:
1620ffff    000101_10001000001111111111111111       bne   $s1, $zero, end
34000000    001101_00000000000000000000000000       ori   $zero, $zero, 0   # noop
